title: Janna Bug
body:
Multiple times i have experienced this Janna bug

when I shield (e) myself just as I am attacked by something like an caitlyn autoattack, the shield does not negate any damage and the shield just dissapears.

replies.body: That means the auto does more damage then the shield health generally that happens when adcs get 1 or 2 items

at level 4? yeah no.

its like the fiddle bug while back, and auto hits just as you use it and it cancels the duration
no i wouldn't be calling it a bug if the dmg did more than the shield. as I'm a Janna main im 100% certain this is a bug however I havn't seen it in the last week
